To arxeio pou tropopooisame akolouthontas tis odigies ine to clook-iosched.c  ,opou tropopoiontas katallila kapoies sinartiseis efarmosame ton kukliko clook algorithmo.
Oi vasikes sinartiseis ine oi clook_add_request i opoia prosthetei taksinomimena mia nea aitisi stin oura kai i clook_dispatch i opoia kaleitai gia tin eksipiretisi tis katalilis aitisis.

Gia tin aksiologisi tou algorithmou dimiourgisame ena programma se C (test.c) .To programma auto grafei se ena arxeio polles fores ton xaraktira 's'.Etsi dimiourgei pollapla aitimata ston disko.Vevaia treksame to programma polles fores me diaforetika arxeia os orismata gia na paroume to epithimito apotelesma.Kathe fora grafame se diaforetiko arxeio

Parakatw parathetoume ena paradeigma apo to peirama mas:

Arxika i oura ine adeia
[  777.807070] [CLOOK] queue: 

Sunexomenes aitiseis mpainoun taksinomimena stin oura

[  777.818809] [CLOOK] add W 941119
[  777.818812] [CLOOK] queue: 941119 
[  777.818813] [CLOOK] add W 942143
[  777.818814] [CLOOK] queue: 941119 942143 
[  777.818816] [CLOOK] add W 943167
[  777.818817] [CLOOK] queue: 941119 942143 943167 
[  777.818819] [CLOOK] add W 944191
[  777.818820] [CLOOK] queue: 941119 942143 943167 944191 
[  777.818824] [CLOOK] add W 945215
[  777.818825] [CLOOK] queue: 941119 942143 943167 944191 945215 
[  777.818827] [CLOOK] add W 946239
[  777.818828] [CLOOK] queue: 941119 942143 943167 944191 945215 946239 
[  777.818830] [CLOOK] add W 947263
[  777.818831] [CLOOK] queue: 941119 942143 943167 944191 945215 946239 947263 

I eksipiretisi twn aitisewn ksekinaei apo to mikrotero sector

[  777.818833] [CLOOK] dsp W 941119
[  777.818834] [CLOOK] queue: 942143 943167 944191 945215 946239 947263 
[  777.818994] [CLOOK] dsp W 942143
[  777.818995] [CLOOK] queue: 943167 944191 945215 946239 947263 
[  777.819102] [CLOOK] dsp W 943167
[  777.819103] [CLOOK] queue: 944191 945215 946239 947263 

Nees aitiseis ftanoun ston disko kai mpainoun stin arxi tis oura afou ine mikroteres .

[  777.820340] [CLOOK] add W 858175
[  777.820341] [CLOOK] queue: 368039 369063 370087 371111 372135 373159 374183 375207 376231 852031 853055 854079 855103 856127 857151 858175 944191 945215 946239 947263 

Ta add exoun oloklirwthei kai epomenws o algorithmos ofeilei na sinexisei tin eksipiretisi apo ekei pou eixe stamatisei.Kati tetoio fainetai stis epomenes grammes kathws i epomeni aitisi pou eksipireteitai ine i 944191(tha eksipiretountan kanonika prin apo ta diadoxika add).Edw fainetai kai i kuklikotita tou algorithmou kathws otan ftanei sto telos tis oura epistrefei stin arxi

[  777.820741] [CLOOK] dsp W 944191
[  777.820743] [CLOOK] queue: 368039 369063 370087 371111 372135 373159 374183 375207 376231 852031 853055 854079 855103 856127 857151 858175 945215 946239 947263 
[  777.822773] [CLOOK] dsp W 945215
[  777.822775] [CLOOK] queue: 368039 369063 370087 371111 372135 373159 374183 375207 376231 852031 853055 854079 855103 856127 857151 858175 946239 947263 
[  777.825680] [CLOOK] dsp W 946239
[  777.825682] [CLOOK] queue: 368039 369063 370087 371111 372135 373159 374183 375207 376231 852031 853055 854079 855103 856127 857151 858175 947263 
[  777.827778] [CLOOK] dsp W 947263
[  777.827780] [CLOOK] queue: 368039 369063 370087 371111 372135 373159 374183 375207 376231 852031 853055 854079 855103 856127 857151 858175 

Otan ftasei sto telos paei pali apo tin arxi.
